name: @microsoft/clarity-mcp-server
description: Retrieve real-time user behavior data for Clarity by integrating its analytics export API with the Model Context Protocol (MCP) ecosystem
long_description: The @microsoft/clarity-mcp-server generates a comprehensive Traffic Overview (total sessions, bot sessions, unique users, pages per session), User Engagement (average scroll depth, total time, active time), and Audience Insights (browser, device, and operating system data). This server is ideal for automating Clarity analytics, powering AI-driven insights, and embedding user behavior data into observability pipelines.

tools.name: get_clarity_data
tools.description: Retrieve and analyze Microsoft Clarity analytics data

prompts.name: get_clarity_insights
prompts.description: Fetch Clarity analytics data using the MCP server.
prompts.text: Fetch Clarity data for the last ${arguments.days} day(s), filtered by ${arguments.dimensions}, with the following metrics: ${arguments.metrics}.
